Please enter new knowledge base name
Original model not found, please select alternative model
Please select the embedding model to use:
Please select the reranker model to use:
Remember this choice, use automatically next time

Word embedding and reranker models use ONNX Runtime inference for optimal broad model support, requiring ONNX format with corresponding model configuration files and tokenizer files. Users can place them separately in the corresponding directories in settings. Note that knowledge base generation and RAG need to use consistent models.

Local LLM inference uses llama.cpp structure LLMs, requiring GGUF format, preferably with corresponding params files. Users can place them separately in the corresponding directories in settings. Due to mobile computing power and memory limitations, maximum support is around 4B models. Better experience is with models below 2B. Local LLMs have weak capabilities and poor performance, suitable for learning and research. For practical use, online large models are recommended.

See help for details
